DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH : INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS
DOC.TEXT: Czech Luxury Hospital Sale Falls Through : The $ 46.4-million sale of the Czech Republic ' s most luxurious hospital to a group partly controlled by South_Africa ' s Clinic Holdings Ltd . has collapsed , the Czech news_agency CTK said . The 230-bed hospital , known as Na Homolce , once served former Czechoslovakia ' s top Communist_Party officials and is now receiving up_to $ 3.5 million a year from the Czech government to stay in operation.Euro Hospital Group Praha is made_up of Clinic Holdings , a surgical and medical private hospital group in Johannesburg , South_Africa ; Cape_Town , South Africa-based Syfin Holdings , and a Czech company formed by Na Homolce ' s director and three head doctors . The group won its bid for the sale in January and signed a contract_in August .
